content: Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. So you might sell a part for $1 today, but then that part, I’m going to use an extreme example, might go to $1.50 next month and you’re still pulling your receivable then at a lower price that plays a little bit of havoc with your cash short term but certainly on your sales and profit you get it there. Your line is open. Your line is open.
